attributes.action: ALL Key Workers to be a high priority for the covid vaccine!
attributes.background: Allow shop workers and other key workers to be a priority for the covid vaccine if they wish. They are in more contact with the public than anybody else, it only takes one of them to spread it to many many people

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

All key workers to be higher up the list for coronavirus vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466

Prioritise Key Retail Workers, being offered the Covid Vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
